metadata.name: things we do. feat. HAGEN, Sergio Mauve & Marcus Ritter
metadata.description:
"things we do." is the next offering in my musical journey. Co-starring HAGEN, Sergio Mauve & Marcus Ritter the song tells the story many are all too familiar with. After breaking up with your significant other memories sweep your mind of all the things you used to do and the memories you had, questioning whether separating was the right choice or not. DISCLAIMER: not responsible if this song causes listeners to call their ex.

Token Utility:  
Future airdrops (to be announced at later dates)  
Special 20% discounted pre-sale access to shows & merchandise before public sales  
Access to private NFT Family members Discord channel where you will get the inside scoop on all future Danny Ives news & releases  
Access to Danny Ives' Token Gated website featuring downloadable acapella, instrumental, acoustic, regular master, slowed down & sped up versions of "things we do."
